title: Jujutsu Kaisen 0 Movie
synopsis: Yuuta Okkotsu is haunted. Ever since his childhood friend Rika died in a traffic accident, her ghost has stuck with him. But her spirit does not appear as the sweet girl Yuuta once knew. Instead, she manifests as a monstrous and powerful entity who fiercely protects him. Unable to control Rika's violent behavior, Yuuta is helpless to stop the bloodshed that follows from her brutal vengeance. As a result, when apprehended by "Jujutsu" sorcerers—the secret guardians of the world, trained to combat forces like Rika—Yuuta wishes to be completely isolated so that no one else can get hurt.
related_anime: ['Jujutsu Kaisen (TV)', 'Jujutsu Kaisen 0: Tokyo Toritsu Jujutsu Koutou Senmon Gakkou']
characters: ['Gojou, Satoru', 'Zenin, Maki', 'Okkotsu, Yuuta', 'Panda', 'Getou, Suguru', 'Inumaki, Toge', 'Orimoto, Rika']
